name: Irrlicht Apprentice (eimie)
description:
In a far away land lies the Shrine of Irrlicht. The Order sends a fresh apprentice into the heart of the shrine to complete a fateful and sinister task.

* Sokoban-like puzzle game with experimental storytelling.
* an adventure with a dark and mysterious theme

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrows: move

SPACE: run

B: undo last move

R: restart room

ESC: open menu and map

PS: This is the fourth game of my "release a game every month in 2022" challenge and a remake of an earlier release: Irrlicht Apprentice. Hope you'll enjoy it!

If you want to support this challenge, feel free to click the donate button above, recommend this game or be one of my first Patrons. Thanks :)

February game: Curse of the Blob King
